3.eng-name: The Book of Menstruation and Istihadah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Zainab bint Jahsh said:"I said to the Prophet (ﷺ) that I was suffering from Istihadah. He said: 'Do not pray during the days of your period, then perform Ghusl and delay Zuhr and bring Maghrib and bring 'Isha' forward and pray them together, and perform Ghusl for Fajr

chapter.ara-name: باب جَمْعِ الْمُسْتَحَاضَةِ بَيْنَ الصَّلاَتَيْنِ وَغُسْلِهَا إِذَا جَمَعَتْ
chapter.eng-name: Woman Suffering From Istihadah Combining Prayers And Performing Ghusl For The Combined Prayers
